Name: Joy Globe
LongDescription: Prevents Fighting-type moves from damaging Normal-type Pokémon. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Normal-type Pokémon.   You can get a Joy Globe at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a White Silk, a Normal Dust, and a White Gem. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
